description: Generates text completions using a specified language model
comment: Requires a defined prompt and model

description: Filters data based on language model evaluations
example: SELECT * FROM data WHERE llm_filter({'model_name': 'default'}, {'prompt_name': 'is_relevant', 'context_columns': [{'data': content}]});

description: Aggregates multiple inputs into a single output using a language model
Reorders query results based on relevance scores from a language model
comment: Enhances result relevance in search applications

description: Selects the top-ranked result after reranking
Selects the bottom-ranked result after reranking
Implements Reciprocal Rank Fusion (RRF) to combine rankings
comment: Combines rankings from multiple scoring systems

description: Sums normalized scores from different scoring systems
comment: Useful for aggregating scores from various models

description: Sums normalized scores and multiplies by the hit count
comment: Enhances the impact of frequently occurring items

description: Computes the median of normalized scores
comment: Reduces the effect of outliers in combined scores

description: Calculates the average of normalized scores
comment: Provides a balanced aggregation of scores
